item.title: Computational Drug Design
item.description: Drug discovery is a slow and expensive process. We aim to accelerate drug discovery by developing advanced computational methods. Specifically, we focus on developing efficient and accurate methods for computing protein-ligand binding free energy. Our approaches are based on rigorous synergy between statistical mechanics and machine learning methods. Recent advances in machine learning, especially deep probabilistic models, present great opportunities for developing revolutionary methods for drug design.
